product_name: Outdoor Research Reflexa Rain Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Rain in the hiking forecast? The women's Outdoor Research Reflexa waterproof rain jacket will keep you protected without sacrificing breathability. Waterproof, breathable 2.5-layer Pertex(R) Shield DS stretch ripstop nylon balances waterproofness, breathability and wind resistance. Seams are fully taped for total protection. Fully adjustable hood folds into collar when not needed; brushed-tricot collar lining feels nice next to skin. 2-way front zipper with interior and exterior windflaps allows venting and fit adjustments. TorsoFlo(TM) double-sliding side zippers open fully from hem to armpits for unparalleled ventilation via poncho-style coverage. Drawcord hem; elastic and rip-and-stick adjustable cuffs. Outdoor Research Reflexa Rain Jacket for women features zippered hand pockets and internal zippered pocket; 1 hand pocket doubles as a stuff sack. Closeout.
short_description: Rain in the hiking forecast? The women's Outdoor Research Reflexa waterproof rain jacket will keep you protected without sacrificing breathability.
